embeds.title: Show Stopper
embeds.description:
Rare Attack / 0 :energy_gremlins: / The Gremlins / Downfall

Can only be played if you have exactly 7 **Wiz** :p_wiz:.
Deal 0 (2) damage to ALL enemies 5 times.

messages.content: Grand Finale, Gremlins Edition
<wiz>

embeds.title: Wiz
embeds.description:
Keyword / Downfall

When you have at least three stacks of Wiz, Attacks will consume all stacks to deal 10 additional damage.

messages.content: this + runic pyramid
fucking rocks
i once had a run
all around wiaz
and show stopped was good
I have never even attempted to make this one work, but I've only done actual grand finale build maybe twice
how do u make a grand finale build
Draw your whole deck every turn
Further draw can allow you to play multiple finals per turn
Obviously you need a lot of removes to do this
Pyramid can help
you also need cards that can draw certain amounts
Grand finale builds always looked cool to me, but it just ends with the player removing a ton of cards and tbh that's a little lame. Like a 20-30 card deck with grand finale sounds hype.
so sometimes you'll see a build with an acrobatics, and an acrobatics+
and a prepared+
and a quick slash
Ok yeah there's actually two different ways to go about it
The one I suggested is more brainless and harder to build but has higher payoff
the "draw your whole deck each turn" requires things like <reflex>

embeds.title: Reflex
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / The Silent / Slay the Spire

**Unplayable**.
If this card is discarded from your hand, draw 2 (3) cards.

messages.content: and a lot more removes
I mostly just used the block+draw 2 card if memory serves
backflip?
Yes
backflip is a very generally good card
rare is the silent deck without at least one
uncommon is the silent deck with only one
Common is the silent deck with more than one
(I felt compelled to finish the pattern)
Yeah I think I got finale from neow, grabbed 1 or 2 backflips, and took nothing else

Show Stopper is easier to activate than Grand Finale, and better ~(you can play it even unactivated if you have strength)~ but is still less appealing because Gremlins have so many other possible things to do that are even stronger
You can't cast it unactivated
Oh right,  JK
I should know that because I do remember drawing it at like 10 wiz and being sad
I was possibly thinking of it also scaling up with strength when you _can_ play it
Anyway I rarely bother with wiz builds because the others are easier,but it does have decent payoffs
basic is the one with only backflip
Trying to figure out if there is any combination of relics that can win with only backflip. Does Sundial / Letter Opener do it?
yeah, i think it works like pommel strike infinite triggering sundial twice
you would need 2 backflips though

absolutely incredible card. Do not be fooled by its artwork, this card is nothing like grand finale! this card takes so much less effort for  grand finally and its substantially stronger scaling 5 times with every bit of strength you have (flex is a good card with this as a result). A deck with show stopper is usually just a normal gremlin wizard deck; expect with a higher emphasis on cards that create wards since those are the simplest way to get to 7 wiz (because you can control when you play them to make sure you have exactly 7; the block helps too). Of course you want more then one attack; just to make sure you get through hallway fights easier and to avoid losing to a miss play (also chosen). Lucky gremlin wizard has the best attacks in the whole mod so thats not even a downside.

the only downsides this has is being a dead pickup if your not playing gremlin wizard and being somwhat reliant on having a high count of raid in your deck to be used consistently (as without raid to make sure its in your hand it can be better to just use 2 attacks with 6 wiz in single target fights).
i'm a strong believer that you can take this card in act 1 its so strong and gremlin wizard is so consistent. Although i'm also a strong believer that gremlins can do anything in act 1, even on a20.
kinda funny that you and I have similar beliefs about the power of Gremlins, yet very different decisions on how often to take this card
admittedly, I am a filthy edible armor/heckle abuser
or six point brand
